title: my league is bugged
body:
i went into a custom, now it wont let me leave. it goes to the reconnect screen and doesn't let me go out of the game. this is preventing me form playing any games and it also isn't letting me join back into the game to finish it. 

Someone help me pls!

replies.body: i'm in same bug right now. how can we fix it and when riot fix this buggggggg
